body:
A MIAM isn’t mediation but an introductory meeting that explains the mediation process. 

You don’t have to attend a MIAM if you’re applying for a consent order or if any of the following apply:

!abbr:MIAM!
heading:
Valid reasons not to attend a MIAM
!abbr:MIAM!
lede:
If you want to go to court you’re legally required to attend a Mediation Information and Assessment Meeting (MIAM).
!abbr:MIAM!
